Problem identification (Score 8/10)

The approach to solve the problem is creative. Idea is novel & unique and can be implemented. Is it some new idea or a copy of another idea?

Solution - Creativity/Innovation(Score 8/10)

Validation of business model in quantifiable terms such as local market size, expected market share, revenue forecast, revenue generated, downloads, subscribers, investment raised, etc.

Addressable Market and Size (Score 8/10)

Understanding level of the problem or issue to be addressed or condition to be improved.

Features & functionality (Score 8/10)

Prototype / Working Model demonstrates intended design and its functionality has been tested in multiple trials for implementation. Minimum viable product.

Social & financial impact so far (Score 8/10)

Number of direct and indirect jobs, cumulative revenue so far, cumulative local/foreign investment so far.

Scalability/expansion plan (Score 8/10)

Future plans for business growth. Local/international. Exit strategy

Relevancy, Justification & Expected Benefits from Event (Score 8/10)

Alignment between startup business objectives and relevancy and justification to attend the proposed event.
